remarks: An edge of a graph always connects two different vertices, analogous to ~ usgraedgrn .  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Sep-2017.) (Revised by AV, 9-Jan-2020.)
statement:
usgpredgdv.e $e |- E = ( Edges ` G ) $.
usgpredgdv $p |- ( ( G e. USGrph /\ { M , N } e. E ) -> M =/= N ) $.
